[{"id":"PORTF-50","entityId":"2-3422","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"PORTF"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"50"},{"name":"summary","value":"Warsztat do przelewów z portfela"},{"name":"description","value":"

Cel - rozpisać listę dev tasków

"},{"name":"created","value":"1522328710841"},{"name":"updated","value":"1523966159836"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"m.krawczyk"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Maciej Krawczyk"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"Radek_Adamczyk"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Radek Adamczyk"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"PORTF-49","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"Priority","value":["Medium"],"valueId":["Medium"],"color":{"bg":"#ffee9c","fg":"#b45f06"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"State","value":["Planned"],"valueId":["Planned"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"p.teklinski","fullName":"Paweł Tekliński"},{"value":"m.krawczyk","fullName":"Maciej Krawczyk"},{"value":"d.remiszewski","fullName":"Daniel Remiszewski"}]},{"name":"Estimation","value":["1260"],"valueId":["2d5h"],"color":null},{"name":"Spent time","value":["780"],"valueId":["1d5h"],"color":null},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"Sprint 13","id":"Production Scrum Board:Sprint 13"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[{"value":"W realizacji","cssClass":"c10"}]}, {"id":"NPKI-356","entityId":"2-3643","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"NPKI"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"356"},{"name":"summary","value":"Reset blokady"},{"name":"description","value":"

  1. Jeśli klient ma blokade
    i pomyślnie zmieni/resetuje hasło
    to blokada zostaje "wyłączona"
    i może korzystać z PK

  2. Po pomyślnym logowaniu "licznik się zeruje" (czyt. po pomyślnym logowaniu jak wykonasz następnie 3 nieudane logowania to blokada na 15min)

Każda zmiana hasła klienta zdejmuje blokadę (nawet w esbo)

"},{"name":"created","value":"1523270254553"},{"name":"updated","value":"1524057153398"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"m.krawczyk"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Maciej Krawczyk"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"p.teklinski"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Paweł Tekliński"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"ITB-1","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"Priority","value":["Medium"],"valueId":["Medium"],"color":{"bg":"#ffee9c","fg":"#b45f06"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"State","value":["In Progress"],"valueId":["In Progress"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"m.krawczyk","fullName":"Maciej Krawczyk"}]},{"name":"Estimation","value":["180"],"valueId":["3h"],"color":null},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"Sprint 13","id":"Production Scrum Board:Sprint 13"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[{"value":"W realizacji","cssClass":"c10"}]}, {"id":"NPKI-357","entityId":"2-3645","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"NPKI"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"357"},{"name":"summary","value":"Zdejmowanie blokady w ESBO"},{"name":"description","value":"

W profilu klienta w preferencjach dać możliwość zdjęcia blokady logowania (o ile istnieje)
Pokazać również info czy blokada jest i na ile

"},{"name":"created","value":"1523270300617"},{"name":"updated","value":"1523270908643"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"p.teklinski"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Paweł Tekliński"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"p.teklinski"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Paweł Tekliński"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"ITB-1","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"Priority","value":["Medium"],"valueId":["Medium"],"color":{"bg":"#ffee9c","fg":"#b45f06"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"State","value":["New"],"valueId":["New"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"m.krawczyk","fullName":"Maciej Krawczyk"}]},{"name":"Estimation","value":["120"],"valueId":["2h"],"color":null},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"Sprint 13","id":"Production Scrum Board:Sprint 13"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[{"value":"W realizacji","cssClass":"c10"}]}, {"id":"ESBO-117","entityId":"2-2663","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"ESBO"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"117"},{"name":"summary","value":"Pobieranie info o płatnościach GIRO"},{"name":"description","value":"

Ostatnio pojawił się problem z komendą esbo:payment:giro:check, która się "zawieszała".

Po sprawdzeniu okazało się, że jedną z przyczyn może być to, że na FTP było bardzo dużo plików.
Rozwiązanie tymczasowe polegało na usunięciu większości plików z folderu OUT/

Aktualnie komenda działa, jednak potrzebne jest ponowne rozpatrzenie jak to realizować i czy zapisywanie "backupu" plików na FTP to napewno dobre rozwiązanie

PS> Sprawdzić czy po usunięciu z OUT w cache się nie usuwają

"},{"name":"created","value":"1518615196740"},{"name":"updated","value":"1524052530280"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"a.malek"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Arkadiusz Malek"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"p.teklinski"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Paweł Tekliński"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"3"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"Priority","value":["Minor"],"valueId":["Minor"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"State","value":["Rejected"],"valueId":["Rejected"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"m.krawczyk","fullName":"Maciej Krawczyk"}]},{"name":"Estimation","value":["300"],"valueId":["5h"],"color":null},{"name":"Spent time","value":["46"],"valueId":["46m"],"color":null},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"Sprint 13","id":"Production Scrum Board:Sprint 13"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"4-1927","author":"p.teklinski","authorFullName":"Paweł Tekliński","issueId":"ESBO-117","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Maciej Krawczyk problem wydaje się być większy. Sprawdz zgłoszenie od adminów: #16687

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1523030472251,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"4-2045","author":"m.krawczyk","authorFullName":"Maciej Krawczyk","issueId":"ESBO-117","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Arkadiusz Malek niestety okazało się, że problem nie został naprawiony, a dokładniej klasyczne "jedno zrobiłeś a drugie zniszczyłeś". Pomysł z przeniesieniem plików do folderu DONE nie przeszedł, bo okazało się, że nie mamy uprawnień, żeby ten folder utworzyć. Na live podmieniłem ścieżki w plikach, ale do następnej wrzutki trzeba problem rozwiązać. Są 2 rozwiązania:

1. Albo BP utworzy nam dodatkowe foldery DONE i OTHER
2. Zmienimy działanie klasy sprzątającej, żeby zamiast przenoszenia plików po prostu jest usuwała
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1524048689836,"updated":1524048715013,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"4-2047","author":"a.malek","authorFullName":"Arkadiusz Malek","issueId":"ESBO-117","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Maciej Krawczyk @Paweł Tekliński dostałem info z BP, że niestety nie mogą utworzyć nam dodatkowych katalogów. Rozwiązanie 1 więc odpada.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1524052530281,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}]
